import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' class Home extends Component { render() { return (

The Basics : Hand Ranking
1.  All Same : K, K, K     
2.  Straight : 10, 9, 8     
3.  Two of a Kind : 5, J, J    
4.  Highest Card : A, J, 2    
Note : Suits of a card doesn't matter
) } } export default Home
